content:
For those of us on Windows 7, it seems the lates version we're allowed to download is ver 115. It's not what I'd call "fully hanged" but it hangs constantly whenever it needs to send or receive emails. Lots of people have reported this and I've spent days (on the Troubleshooting forum) asking if it's possible to roll back to a version which previously worked - but no-one seems interested.

Some rollback instructions would be very useful.
creator: john391

content: We are using Windows 11 64bit OS & we are updated Thunderbird 12.8 version and after update only we are facing this issue
creator: siddu.ec30
